summary: Frontend testing completed for 3 new features: Google Calendar section in Settings, CV selector in application form, and Cover Letter Generator modal. Found and FIXED a critical bug with SelectItem empty value causing runtime error.

ui_bugs.issue: SelectItem with empty string value caused runtime error: 'A <Select.Item /> must have a value prop that is not an empty string'

passed_tests: Frontend: Login with demo@test.com / demo123 credentials
Frontend: Settings page loads with Google Calendar section
Frontend: Google Calendar section shows 'n'est pas configuré' message (expected - credentials not set)
Frontend: Google Calendar section shows 'Synchronisez vos entretiens avec Google Calendar' description
Frontend: New application modal opens without errors (after fix)
Frontend: CV selector field 'CV associé' present in application form
Frontend: CV selector shows 'Aucun CV' option
Frontend: CV selector helper text 'Associez un CV de votre bibliothèque à cette candidature' present
Frontend: Application detail modal shows 'Lettre IA' button
Frontend: Cover Letter Generator modal opens from application detail
Frontend: Cover Letter Generator shows 'Générer une Lettre de Motivation' title
Frontend: Cover Letter Generator shows CV selector and tone selector
Frontend: Cover Letter Generator shows 'Générer avec l'IA' button
Frontend: Dashboard card spacing with gap-5 (20px) verified
critical_code_review_comments: FIXED: SelectItem components in ApplicationsPage.jsx and CoverLetterGeneratorModal.jsx were using empty string values which is not allowed by Radix UI Select. Changed to use 'none' value with conversion logic.
Google Calendar OAuth is MOCKED - credentials (GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_ID, GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_SECRET) are not configured, so the section shows 'not configured' message as expected.
seed_data_creation: TEST_Company application was created and deleted during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 new features verified: 1) Google Calendar section in Settings (shows 'not configured' as expected since OAuth credentials not set), 2) CV selector in application form (fixed SelectItem empty value bug), 3) Cover Letter Generator modal accessible from application detail view. Dashboard card spacing with gap-5 verified.

google_calendar_settings.description: Synchronisez vos entretiens avec Google Calendar
google_calendar_settings.status: Shows 'Google Calendar n'est pas configuré sur ce serveur' (expected - MOCKED)
google_calendar_settings.connect_button: Not shown when not configured (correct behavior)

cv_selector_in_application_form.label: CV associé
cv_selector_in_application_form.helper_text: Associez un CV de votre bibliothèque à cette candidature
cv_selector_in_application_form.bug_fixed: Changed SelectItem value from empty string to 'none'

cover_letter_generator_modal.access: Via 'Lettre IA' button in application detail modal
cover_letter_generator_modal.title: Générer une Lettre de Motivation
cover_letter_generator_modal.subtitle: L'IA va créer une lettre personnalisée
cover_letter_generator_modal.tone_selector: Ton de la lettre (Professionnel, Enthousiaste, Formel)
cover_letter_generator_modal.bug_fixed: Changed SelectItem value from empty string to 'none'

mocked_apis.google_calendar_oauth: MOCKED - GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_ID and GOOGLE_CALENDAR_CLIENT_SECRET not configured
